fields: What is sentiment analysis and what are the main approaches?

Task: Determine emotional tone of text (positive/negative/neutral)
Approaches: Lexicon-based, machine learning, deep learning
Challenges: Sarcasm, context, domain adaptation
Applications: Social media monitoring, product reviews, customer feedback

What is machine translation and what are the main paradigms?

Task: Automatically translate text from source to target language
Statistical: Phrase-based models with alignment
Neural: Encoder-decoder with attention (seq2seq)
Modern: Transformer-based models (mT5, multilingual BERT)
NLP Tasks and Applications

What is text summarization and what are the two main types?

Extractive: Select and combine important sentences from source
Abstractive: Generate new sentences that capture key information
Extractive pros: Factually accurate, faster
Abstractive pros: More coherent, concise, human-like
NLP Tasks and Applications

What is question answering and what are the main types?

Extractive: Extract answer span from given passage
Generative: Generate answer from knowledge
Open-domain: Answer from large corpus (web, Wikipedia)
Closed-domain: Answer within specific domain/document

What is topic modeling and what algorithms are commonly used?

Task: Discover abstract topics in document collection
LDA: Latent Dirichlet Allocation - probabilistic generative model
NMF: Non-negative Matrix Factorization - linear algebra approach
Modern: Neural topic models, BERT-based clustering
NLP Tasks and Applications

What is text classification and what are common approaches?

Task: Assign predefined categories to text documents
Features: Bag-of-words, TF-IDF, n-grams
Algorithms: Naive Bayes, SVM, neural networks
Modern: Fine-tuned transformer models (BERT, RoBERTa)
NLP Tasks and Applications

What is information extraction and what are its subtasks?

Goal: Extract structured information from unstructured text
NER: Named Entity Recognition (people, places, organizations)
RE: Relation Extraction (relationships between entities)
Event: Event extraction (what happened, when, where)

What are the main challenges in conversational AI?

Context: Maintaining coherent multi-turn conversations
Consistency: Avoiding contradictions with previous statements
Knowledge: Incorporating world knowledge appropriately
Personality: Maintaining consistent persona/style
NLP Tasks and Applications

What is text generation and what are the main approaches?

Task: Produce coherent text given some input/prompt
Template-based: Fill predefined templates with content
Statistical: N-gram models, language models
Neural: RNN/LSTM/Transformer autoregressive generation
NLP Tasks and Applications

What is document similarity and how is it typically computed?

Task: Measure how similar two documents are
Vector space: TF-IDF vectors + cosine similarity
Semantic: Average word embeddings + distance metrics
Modern: Sentence/document embeddings (Doc2Vec, BERT)
